tagNotebook: UPPER CANADA SUNDRIES July to December 1809

tagDescription: Enquiring as to payment of rent.
tagNotebook: UPPER CANADA SUNDRIES July to December 1810

tagDescription: Represents unnecessary expense to Government on United Empire loyalists grants of land, issued free of expense to them.
tagNotebook: UPPER CANADA SUNDRIES July to December 1810
UPPER CANADA SUNDRIES July to December 1809
tagDescription: Naval stores have been shipped.

tagNotebook: UPPER CANADA SUNDRIES January to June 1810
tagDescription: Seeking a contract for timber, cut down in the Newcastle and Midland districts.

tagNotebook: UPPER CANADA SUNDRIES January to June 1810
tagDescription: Joshua Y. Cozens to same. Announcing the death of John Brownell, late member of Parliament for Stormont and Russell counties.

tagNotebook: UPPER CANADA SUNDRIES July to December 1810
tagDescription: Transmits Smith's plan of survey of islands in Lake St. Clair. (Plan not at this place.)

tagNotebook: UPPER CANADA SUNDRIES July to December 1810
tagDescription: Respecting a reserve being moved in Bayham.
Resigns as Coroner of the Newcastle District. (Rec. April, 1810).
tagNotebook: UPPER CANADA SUNDRIES January to June 1810
UPPER CANADA SUNDRIES July to December 1810
tagDescription: Acknowledges letter setting date for meeting of Parliament.

tagNotebook: UPPER CANADA SUNDRIES July to December 1809
tagDescription: Authorizes proclamation appointing Joseph Edwards, Niagara, as commissioner for purchase of hemp.
